education.description: Pelatihan intensif untuk meningkatkan kompetensi pedagogik dan professional guru dalam menerapkan Kurikulum Merdeka.
achievements: Presenter Best Practice di Kelas Berbagi

education.description: Fokus pada pembelajaran tematik interdisipliner serta pengembangan karakter siswa melalui pendekatan holistik dan kolaboratif.
achievements: Juara 1 Lomba Inovasi Pembelajaran Tingkat Nasional
Asisten Dosen Mata Kuliah Psikologi Pendidikan
education.thesis: Implementasi Pembelajaran Berdiferensiasi dalam Meningkatkan Motivasi Belajar Siswa Kelas IV

education.description: Mastering digital tools and innovative teaching methods to create engaging and effective learning experiences in the digital era.
achievements: Top 10 Finalist National Digital Teaching Competition

education.description: Pelatihan bahasa Inggris untuk meningkatkan kemampuan komunikasi dan pengajaran dalam konteks global.
Berpartisipasi aktif dalam organisasi, debat, dan kegiatan sosial yang mengasah empati, kepemimpinan, serta komunikasi publik.
achievements: Juara 2 Debat Bahasa Inggris Tingkat Kota

education.description: Program pascasarjana fokus pada penelitian inovasi pembelajaran dan kebijakan pendidikan dasar yang berkelanjutan.
Pelatihan khusus untuk menangani siswa berkebutuhan khusus dalam setting kelas inklusif dengan pendekatan differentiated instruction.
Program spesialisasi dalam integrasi Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics dalam pembelajaran dasar.
Online executive program focusing on strategic leadership, school management, and educational transformation in digital age.
Program sertifikasi psikologi pendidikan untuk memahami perkembangan kognitif, sosial-emosional siswa dan teknik konseling dasar.
Specialization in creating engaging digital educational content including videos, interactive modules, and gamified learning materials.
Pelatihan metodologi penelitian pendidikan kuantitatif dan kualitatif untuk pengembangan profesional berkelanjutan.
Program pendidikan lingkungan hidup untuk mengintegrasikan konsep sustainability dan conservation dalam kurikulum.
Sertifikasi pendidikan anak usia dini dengan fokus pada perkembangan holistik dan stimulasi multidimensi.

courses.title: Classroom Management Mastery
courses.description: Advanced techniques in classroom management, behavior guidance, and creating positive learning environments.

courses.title: Digital Assessment Tools
courses.description: Mastering various digital assessment tools for formative and summative evaluation in modern classrooms.

courses.title: Creative Writing for Teachers
courses.description: Developing creative writing skills for educational materials, storytelling, and student engagement.

courses.title: Mindfulness in Education
courses.description: Integrating mindfulness practices into daily classroom routines for student well-being and focus.

courses.title: Project-Based Learning Design
courses.description: Comprehensive training in designing, implementing, and assessing project-based learning units.

courses.title: Educational Technology Integration
courses.description: Advanced course on integrating technology seamlessly into curriculum and instruction.

courses.title: Student-Centered Learning
courses.description: Strategies for shifting from teacher-centered to student-centered learning environments.

courses.title: Cultural Responsive Teaching
courses.description: Developing culturally responsive teaching practices for diverse classroom settings.

courses.title: Data-Driven Instruction
courses.description: Using student data to inform instructional decisions and personalize learning pathways.

courses.title: Gamification in Education
courses.description: Applying game design elements and principles in educational contexts to increase engagement.
